Interface GymAdminDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
GymAdminDAOImpl
public interface GymAdminDAO
Data Access Object interface for system administrative operations. Provides methods for viewing gym owners, centers, and managing registrations.
Author:
team IOTA

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    approveGymCenter(int centerId)
    Approves a pending gym center request.
    boolean
    approveGymOwner(int ownerId)
    Approves a pending gym owner registration.
    List<GymCenter>
    viewGymCenters()
    Retrieves a list of all gym centers in the system.
    List<GymOwner>
    viewGymOwners()
    Retrieves a list of all gym owners in the system.
    List<GymCenter>
    viewPendingGymCenters()
    Retrieves a list of gym centers that are awaiting approval.
    List<Registration>
    viewPendingRegistrations()
    Retrieves a list of user registrations that are awaiting approval.

  • Method Details

    • viewGymOwners

      List<GymOwner> viewGymOwners()
      Retrieves a list of all gym owners in the system.
      Returns:
      a list of all registered GymOwner objects

    • viewGymCenters

      List<GymCenter> viewGymCenters()
      Retrieves a list of all gym centers in the system.
      Returns:
      a list of all GymCenter objects

    • approveGymOwner

      boolean approveGymOwner(int ownerId)
      Approves a pending gym owner registration.
      Parameters:
      ownerId - the unique ID of the owner to approve
      Returns:
      true if the approval was successful

    • approveGymCenter

      boolean approveGymCenter(int centerId)
      Approves a pending gym center request.
      Parameters:
      centerId - the unique ID of the center to approve
      Returns:
      true if the approval was successful

    • viewPendingGymCenters

      List<GymCenter> viewPendingGymCenters()
      Retrieves a list of gym centers that are awaiting approval.
      Returns:
      a list of pending GymCenter objects

    • viewPendingRegistrations

      List<Registration> viewPendingRegistrations()
      Retrieves a list of user registrations that are awaiting approval.
      Returns:
      a list of pending Registration objects
